title: Rebaelliun - The Hells Decrees [Metal] (2016) (mp3)
description:
Rebaelliun - The Hells Decrees [Metal] (2016) (mp3)

Rebaelliun is a Brazilian death metal band that was founded in 1998. Musically they are similar to their country mates Krisiun. After the release of their promo tape, the band was contracted by the Dutch label Hammerheart Records, who released their debut album Burn the Promised Land in 1999. The release was followed by a European tour. The band recorded an EP for Bringer of War, featuring a Morbid Angel cover. Shortly thereafter a second album was released Annihilation which was followed by a second European tour. Various problems eventually caused the band to dissolve in 2001. But after a hiatus of 13 years, REBAELLIUN announces the return to activities this year (2015)! According to a quotation in his official personal page, Fabiano Penna (guitarist and founding member) said Rebaelliun is now reunite again (with all the original members of the last line up) to write down a new chapter of brutality in Rebaelliun's history. A new Ã¡lbum (3rd one) and a worldwide tour is already been planned for 2016
